-  controlStyle 

Instance Property# controlStyle

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
final var controlStyle: IntentParameter<Value>.DoubleControlStyle? { get }
```

Available when `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue`, `Value` conforms to `Sendable`, and `Value.ValueType` is `Double`.## [See Also](/documentation/AppIntents/IntentParameter/controlStyle-5ryd1#see-also)

### [Accessing the control style](/documentation/AppIntents/IntentParameter/controlStyle-5ryd1#Accessing-the-control-style)

[`enum DoubleControlStyle`](/documentation/appintents/intentparameter/doublecontrolstyle)An enum that describes the control style of a Double parameter.
